Sugarcss

v1.0.0-alpha.41

s-radius

Type:Declaration
Status:stable
Since:0.0.1
Platform:css
@lotsof.sugarcss.css.declaration

This variable allows you to declare a radius easily and use it in your css. You can declare as many radius as you want.

Params

  1. topLeftOrAll*String

    The top left radius value or the same value for all corners

  2. topRightString

    The top right radius value

  3. bottomRightString

    The bottom right radius value

  4. bottomLeftString

    The bottom left radius value

Example

:root {
   --s-radius-default: 10px;
   --s-radius-special: 20px 10px 12px 34px;
}

.my-element {
   border-radius: s-radius();
   border-radius: s-radius(special);

  // or using a mixin
  @s-radius(special);
}
